item.description:
Hey everyone.  Just updating the event details on Saturday night.  I will, more then likely, be there by 9:30, but if you come over early, just shoot me a text so I can keep an eye out for you.  My cell phone number is listed in the "How to find us..." section, but chances are (if you haven't met me yet, you'll learn this is true), despite being short, I tend to be very loud, usually laughing, so I'll be easy to find.  Trust me.

 

On Saturday, if you text "Titanium" to 25827, your first drink is FREE.  Don't drink or playing designated driver?  Text it anyway...I'm sure someone will take the free drink off your hand :)

 

I hear great things about the club, so I'm really hopeful this event goes well.  I am soooo looking forward to seeing everyone on Saturday.
item.name: Titanium Bar and Lounge
